31Z.F.summary: Grupa Zywiec S.A. produces and sells beers in Poland. It also offers other alcoholic beverages and soft drinks. The company serves customers under the Heineken, Zyweic, Desperados, Warka, EB, Delicacy, Tatra, Royal, Lezask, Brackie, and Wild brand names. The company exports its products primarily to the United States, Canada, Germany, Ireland, and the United Kingdom. The company was founded in 1856 and is based in Warsaw, Poland. Grupa Zywiec S.A. is a subsidiary of Heineken International B.V.
